usage_rules.gradients: NO gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or noise textures.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Use Slate-900 for main text, Slate-600 for secondary.
usage_rules.borders: Use Slate-200 (#E2E8F0) for subtle borders. Use Orange-500 for active borders.

trust_indicator.alt: Site engineer checking inventory on tablet

texture_concrete.usage: Subtle background for pricing cards or footer

do: Use high contrast text (Slate-900) for readability.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all pricing and quantitative data.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
Use sharp corners (rounded-sm) for a 'constructed' feel.
dont: Do not use gradients for backgrounds.
Do not use generic 'Inter' for headings.
Do not use soft, blurry shadows (keep them tight and sharp).
Do not use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl (too playful).

instructions_to_main_agent.setup: Configure Tailwind theme to match the palette and typography defined above.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize shadcn components in /components/ui to match the 'Industrial Swiss' aesthetic (remove heavy rounding, increase border widths).
instructions_to_main_agent.pages: Prioritize the Dashboard for 'Density' (Bento grid) and the Landing Page for 'Impact' (Tetris grid).
